modName: More revealing Nightingale armor for Sundracon Male
descriptionHtml:
The goal of Nightingale armor is stealth, but this armor will get you noticed. While your foe gawks, just whip out your little dagger and slip it in him! If it\'s your friend, he\'ll be too busy admiring your well-ventilated grill to notice you\'ve fingered his coinpurse.

When not sneaking about, the mesh front and back will let the sun and air in, but keep the bugs out.

Requires Sundracon mesh from Better Males mod.
author: Seedye

files.name: Revealing Nightingale armor for Sundracon Male
files.fileName: Revealing Nightingale armor for Sundracon Male-31224-0-9.zip
